title: #1555 A Plan is a Plan
itunes:title: #1555 A Plan is a Plan
description:
Adam and Dr. Drew open the show by going straight to the phones and speaking to a caller about the Will Smith/Chris Rock situation and wants to know how Adam would have reacted if he had been in Rock's shoes. Drew also give his in depth analysis of what he believes may be going on in Will Smith's life that would lead to such behavior. Later they turn to the phones and speak to a caller who wants to share a new poll that shows Covid very low on American's list of concerns. 

Please Support Our Sponsors:
SimpliSafe.com/ADAM2
Lifelock.com, promo code ADAM
Geico.com
Pluto.TV
